prefercite.head: Preferred Citation

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This holding was purchased from Walter Benjamin of New York, New York on June 4, 1965.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This letter form John Fiske to Editor of The Nation[Wendell Phillips Garrison] includes a 2 1/2 p. reply from "The Reviewer" 1876 Nov 25 and concerns review of J. F.'s Unseen World: J. F. feels an error has been made; reply explains position taken.
